statements: SELECT class_name, instructor_id, day_of_week FROM class_schedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 101 ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE start_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Friday' ORDER BY instructor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM class_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 2 AND day_of_week = 'Friday';
SELECT class_id, instructor_id, day_of_week FROM class_schedule WHERE class_id > 3 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3 AND day_of_week IN ('Tuesday', 'Thursday') ORDER BY day_of_week, start_time;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM class_schedules WHERE instructor_id = 101 ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, availability_start_time, availability_end_time FROM instructor_availability WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT class_name FROM class_schedules WHERE class_time >= '2022-10-01' AND class_time < '2022-11-01';
SELECT instructor_name, availability_start_time FROM instructor_availability ORDER BY availability_start_time ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules ORDER BY class_time DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(class_id) as num_classes FROM class_schedules cs INNER JOIN instructor_availability ia ON cs.instructor_id = ia.instructor_id GROUP BY instructor_name ORDER BY num_classes DESC;

SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_time FROM class_schedules cs INNER JOIN instructor_availability ia ON cs.instructor_id = ia.instructor_id WHERE class_time > '2022-01-01' AND class_time < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY class_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT instructor_name,MIN(availability_start_time) AS earliest_availability,MAX(availability_end_time) AS latest_availability FROM instructor_availability GROUP BY instructor_name;

SELECT instructor_name, SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, availability_start_time, availability_end_time)) AS total_availability_seconds FROM instructor_availability GROUP BY instructor_name ORDER BY total_availability_seconds DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_data WHERE attendance_time >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE class_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, available_day, available_time_start FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_day = 'Monday';

SELECT class_name, instructor_name, attendance_time FROM class_schedule INNER JOIN instructor_availability ON class_schedule.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id INNER JOIN attendance_data ON class_schedule.class_id = attendance_data.class_id WHERE attendance_data.attendance_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY attendance_data.attendance_time ASC;

SELECT class_name, student_id, attendance_time FROM class_schedule INNER JOIN attendance_data ON class_schedule.class_id = attendance_data.class_id WHERE class_name LIKE '%Math%' AND attendance_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY attendance_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_start_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_name DESC, class_id ASC
SELECT instructor_name, availability_start_time, availability_end_time FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_start_time >= '2021-10-01' AND availability_end_time <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT student_name, student_phone FROM student WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com'

SELECT class_name, instructor_name, attendance_date FROM class_schedule JOIN attendance_data ON class_schedule.class_id = attendance_data.class_id WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, status FROM student JOIN attendance_data ON student.student_id = attendance_data.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM class_schedules;
SELECT class_name, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedules WHERE class_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, speciality FROM instructors WHERE speciality = 'Dance';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedules WHERE class_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT instructor_name, speciality FROM instructors WHERE speciality = 'Yoga' AND availability_days @> ARRAY['Monday'];
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
